snippet: Marcel Hirscher of Austria all but wrapped up his second straight overall World Cup title when the men’s super-G in Lenzerheide, Switzerland, was canceled by bad weather.
abstract: Men’s World Cup super-G in Lenzerheide, Switzerland, is canceled because of bad weather.
lead_paragraph: Marcel Hirscher of Austria all but wrapped up his second straight overall World Cup title when the men’s super-G in Lenzerheide, Switzerland, was canceled by bad weather.
